name: Current Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging. The company platform works as a facilitator in e-mobility and smart grid ecosystems and is a solution for operations, management, energy optimization, and payment for operators of EV chargers, enabling charge point operators to establish EV charging operations that scale fast and efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging. The company platform works as a facilitator in e-mobility and smart grid ecosystems and is a solution for operations, management, energy optimization, and payment for operators of EV chargers, enabling charge point operators to establish EV charging operations that scale fast and efficiently.
